snippet.title: 20 Minutes Till Dawn – Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Shoot down an ever growing horde of Lovecraftian monsters to survive the night. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds. Unlock a diverse cast of characters and weapons with unique powers. Release date – Available now on PC (Steam) in Early Access.

Want more? Subscribe here ► http://bit.ly/vgt_subscribe
► Website ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1966900/20_Minutes_Till_Dawn
● 2022 DEV: flanne / PUBLISHER: flanne, Erabit

Buy games on G2A: https://www.g2a.com/n/vgt1337
G2A Trending (Bestselling, The best offers): https://www.g2a.com/n/vgttrending
Good deals for Indie Games: https://www.g2a.com/n/vgt_indie
Check game Bundles & Humble Store: https://bit.ly/TheHumbleStore

Check out playlists:
● VideoGameTrailers  http://bit.ly/VGTtrailers



Unique Builds Every Run
In this roguelite survival game, select from a variety of upgrades to create a unique and overpowered builds every run. You can be a fire wizard, for example, and ignite monsters with every pump of your shotgun, or an agile ninja who controls magic knives to pierce your enemies.

Select Your Hero
Choose from a diverse selection of characters and weapons that offer a variety of gameplay experiences.

Features:
- Over 50 different upgrades too choose from for a unique experience every run!
- Wide cast of characters, with more to come post-launch.
- Casual, quick 10-20 minute play sessions, for busy gamers.

#GameTrailers #Roguelite #Lovecraftian
